text: Klaxons are an English dance/punk band, based in London. Their name comes from the word klaxon which is a type of alarm. == Discography == === Albums === * Myths of the near future - 29 January 2007 * Surfing the Void - 31 August 2010 ==References== Category:English rock bands Category:English punk bands Category:Musical groups from London Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in England
title: Klaxons
